title: Sir, you are intreated to give notice in publick this next Lords day the 15 of August, that Master Christianus Ravius, heretofore publick professor of the orientall tongues in some universities beyond the seas, will begin a lecture of these tongues in London-House, ...
author: Raue, Christian, 1613-1677.
notes: Title from opening words of text.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
